mapper.sql: id, date, name, award_level, students, teachers, specialty_id, specialty_name, status, create_time, create_user, modify_time, modify_user
mapper.select:
select
from subject_competition
and instr(name,#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and instr(award_level,#{award_level,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and instr(students,#{students,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and instr(teachers,#{teachers,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and instr(specialty_id,#{specialty_id,jdbcType=INTEGER})
and instr(specialty_name,#{specialty_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
limit #{pages,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{limit,jdbcType=INTEGER};

select count(*) from subject_competition
and instr(name,#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and instr(award_level,#{award_level,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and instr(students,#{students,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and instr(teachers,#{teachers,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and instr(specialty_id,#{specialty_id,jdbcType=INTEGER})
and instr(specialty_name,#{specialty_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
